languages.text: "У одного из моих соратников украли время жизни. Если ты хочешь, чтобы я преуспел{mf||а} на арене — верни ему похищенные годы".

traits.locale_text: "У одного из моих соратников украли время жизни. Если ты хочешь, чтобы я преуспел{mf||а} на арене — верни ему похищенные годы".

languages.text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."
languages.original_text: "У одного из моих соратников украли время жизни. Если ты хочешь, чтобы я преуспел{mf||а} на арене — верни ему похищенные годы".

traits.locale_text: "One of my comrades was robbed of years of his life. If you want me to succeed in the arena, give him back his time."
"One of my comrades was robbed of years of his life. If you want me to succeed in the arena, give him back his time."
"One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."
"One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."
"One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."
"One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

languages.text: « Un de mes camarades s'est fait voler des années de sa vie. Si vous souhaitez que je remporte la victoire dans l'arène, rendez-lui ce temps perdu. »
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: « Un de mes camarades s'est fait voler des années de sa vie. Si vous souhaitez que je remporte la victoire dans l'arène, rendez-lui ce temps perdu. »

languages.text: “我其中一位战友被夺走了几十年的寿命。如果你打算让我在竞技场上获胜的话，就把那个人被夺走的寿命还给他。”
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: “我其中一位战友被夺走了几十年的寿命。如果你打算让我在竞技场上获胜的话，就把那个人被夺走的寿命还给他。”

languages.text: "Einem meiner Kameraden wurden Jahre seines Lebens gestohlen. Wenn Ihr möchtet, dass ich in der Arena Erfolg habe, gebt ihm die gestohlene Zeit zurück."
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: "Einem meiner Kameraden wurden Jahre seines Lebens gestohlen. Wenn Ihr möchtet, dass ich in der Arena Erfolg habe, gebt ihm die gestohlene Zeit zurück."

languages.text: «A uno de mis compañeros le han robado años de vida. Si quiere que me vaya bien en la arena, devuélvamelos».
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: «A uno de mis compañeros le han robado años de vida. Si quiere que me vaya bien en la arena, devuélvamelos».

languages.text: 「私の仲間のひとりは、何年もの時間を奪われた。アリーナでの私の成功を願うなら、奪われた時間を返してほしい」
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仲間のひとりは、何年もの時間を奪われた。アリーナでの私の成功を願うなら、奪われた時間を返してほしい」

languages.text: "Yoldaşlarımın birinin yılları ondan çalındı. Arenada başarılı olmamı istiyorsan çalınan zamanı geri ver."
languages.original_text: "One of my comrades had years of his life stolen from him. If you wish for my success in the arena, return the stolen time."

traits.locale_text: "Yoldaşlarımın birinin yılları ondan çalındı. Arenada başarılı olmamı istiyorsan, çalınan zamanı geri ver."
